segments.text: Your 3.5 percent share is going to be worth at least a million .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to be motivated , Vince.Multi - motivated . As in multi-million .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You wouldn't ! If you leave , you'll make nothing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I might make nothing even if I stay . For that kind of risk , I want to get rich .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . If you sign the Stars.com account before WebTracker does , we'll talk next week .
segments.speaker: S1
